install.name: Flickr
install.description: This module will performs a Flickr search and displays one or more images

param.name: flickr_api_key
param.label: Flickr API key
param.description: The API key that allows Flickr searches.

param.name: cache_expire
param.label: Cache expire (hours)
param.description: Number of hours to cache results.

param.name: num_items
param.label: # of items
param.description: Number of news items to display

param.name: border
param.label: Border pixels
param.description: Number of pixels for gray border
